user_question: What are the geological features of the Grand Canyon, and can you generate an image of its stratified rock layers?
final_answer: The Grand Canyon features include layered sedimentary rocks, ancient schist, and granite. Image of the stratified rock layers generated. These layers were formed over millions of years through sediment deposition, compaction, and tectonic activity.
